title: Ummm, well... Champ select frozen at 0 seconds
body:
What is this lol

help?

Edit: rebooted league, reconnect button pops up, can't click it

replies.body:
We're investigating this issue now - thanks for the reports!

EDIT: 

We're tracking this issue here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/P9hxX3TY-game-start-end-issues-22022016  

We'll update that thread with information as soon as we can!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rHZWy7gE,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2016-02-22T01:30:21.636+0000)
>
> We're investigating this issue now - thanks for the reports!

ZZZZZAAAP there goes the client zaaaap. free 1k rito points pls for all. ty

bought a 1 day xp boost, i'd appriciate if it got refreshed zaps, or ill zap you zap you hurrrrd
Thanks for the swift response. God bless.
Thanks Zaps!!

THANK YOU :)

Get lost steve...

-James

Leave Steve alone James.

- Tnk

RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS 
RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS 
RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS 
RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS 
RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS RITO PLS
I hope it's a loss prevented U.U I seriously hate to see my elo drop because of this stupid bug. {{champion:121}}
We won a game about 15 minutes ago and it's still telling me to reconnect {{item:3070}}
Riot's allowed to bug us out of our ranked games like this, but Graves can't have a cigar? smh

Meanwhile Rito Just ignoring this issue even though its all over boards

Rito pls HALP
they are probably trying to fix it rather then respond to people on the boards
My game just started

It looks like the game doesn't actually start, as if you use something like oce.op.gg to view ingame info, it says summoner not in active game.  As such I don't think we're going to face a loss or getting booted from a promo series etc.... Just gotta wait for Riot to fix it
RITO PL0X
Same thing just happened to my Ranked queue. Countdown hit 0, we were just sitting in the lobby, still able to chat. I've relogged and now I'm presented with a Reconnect button that doesn't work.

Honestly I knew something was up when i kept getting random dc's yesterday, never happened before. Everything else was connected except for league!
Riot please fix this.
If it's happening to everyone, Riot will know about it and will be on to fixing the issue. Hopefully it will be loss prevented
same problem here, can't reconnect or anything, not the jams.
Problem is it was ranked, and im now gonna lose my promo series due to this thing...
i don't think the games actually went through so it shouldn't count as really anything.

> [{quoted}](name=fcuk you,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rHZWy7gE,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-02-22T01:24:50.623+0000)
>
> i don't think the games actually went through so it shouldn't count as really anything.

I'm hoping so. Was about to lose a ranked game hahah
Same thing for me
dont worry think alot of people are getting it server crashes when recconecting to games, hopefully riot already knows and is trying to fix it

You and me both. have reset computer and everything. 

am in promos in ranked too. 

GG :(
Yeah it wont let me reconnect :(
Same

this has also happened to me in a ranked game. there were others in champ select stuck also and we talked between ourselves before we got bored. then on relog in the you have left the game popped up but he reconnect doesnt do anything.
Its broken!
lol what can we do now? click the reconnect button, and nothing happened
when you try to play urgot adc and the game crashes {{item:3070}} {{champion:6}} {{item:3070}}
Also happening to me
same
Happened to me too, now stuck on the reconnect button which doesn't work.

Exactly the same thing happened to my mate and i, two accounts frozen in a time warp. report riot for client bug, pls respond, yaddayaddayaddda

RIOT WHAT THE FO IS THE GO HERE!?
LF 100 lp. Lost it during the great OCE freeze
Yep I in same situation, but didn't sit at 0 sec, said prepping game
have the same issue, it shows not in game but cant click the reconnect button
Oh so this is a thing. That puts me at ease, when I couldn't connect to my ranked game I thought I was screwed. {{summoner:31}}
RIP Matchmaking, same problems are happening here too  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Yep same happened to me, was in champ select and froze before going to load screen.  On the up side I could still talk to my team mates via chat.  When I reconnected the button wouldn't go to load screen.  Seems like an OCE wide issue.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} Same here
SAME, PLS FIX, I WAS ON A 14 GAME WIN STREAK, DON'T LET ME LOSE LIKE THIS!

This just happened to a friend of mine... twice. 

On different accounts too. Please help, we just wanna game!
Bugs are fun, I am also in this situation
